Evolt Org Downtime

19 May 2000

This afternoon beginning at 3pm CST the *dynamic* parts of the evolt.org website will be down.\n \n

\n

\nBy dynamic, I mean that pretty much all the articles, comments, or anything thats pulled out of the database.\nWe'll be upgrading our main Oracle server(to 8.1.6) this afternoon and that will require a small amount of downtime. Thanks for your understanding!\n
